SEARCH
程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.block.storage

接口 ArtisanBlockStorage

@NonExtendable public interface ArtisanBlockStorage
Custom block data storage service, responsible for managing all placed custom block instances.

Provides query and type checking functions for custom blocks, supporting access via coordinates or Block instances. Some methods marked as thread-safe can be called in multi-threaded environments.

另请参阅:
  • basic block data interface
  • Get service instance

    • getArtisanBlockData

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanBlockData getArtisanBlockData(@NotNull @NotNull UUID worldUID, int x, int y, int z)
      Gets custom block data by world coordinates
      参数:
      worldUID - target world UID
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      z - Z coordinate
      返回:
      the corresponding block data
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if not found

    • isArtisanBlock

      boolean isArtisanBlock(@NotNull @NotNull UUID worldUID, int x, int y, int z)
      Checks if the coordinate position is a registered custom block
      参数:
      worldUID - target world UID (non-null)
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      z - Z coordinate
      返回:
      true if it is a valid custom block

    • isArtisanBlock

      default boolean isArtisanBlock(@NotNull @NotNull World world, int x, int y, int z)
      Checks if the coordinate position is a registered custom block

      world - target world (non-null)
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      z - Z coordinate
      返回:
      true if it is a valid custom block

    • isArtisanBlock

      default boolean isArtisanBlock(@NotNull @NotNull Block block)
      Checks if the block is a registered custom block
      参数:
      block - block to check (non-null)
      返回:
      true if it is a valid custom block

    • isArtisanBlock

      default boolean isArtisanBlock(@NotNull @NotNull Location location)
      Checks if the block at the location is a registered custom block
      参数:
      location - location to check (non-null)
      返回:
      true if it is a valid custom block

    • setArtisanBlockData

      void setArtisanBlockData(@NotNull @NotNull UUID worldUID, int x, int y, int z, @Nullable @Nullable ArtisanBlockData artisanBlockData)
      Sets custom block data at the specified location (the actual block in the world needs to be set manually first)
      参数:
      worldUID - target world UID (non-null)
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      z - Z coordinate
      artisanBlockData - custom block data (null means air)

    • setArtisanBlockData

      default void setArtisanBlockData(@NotNull @NotNull World world, int x, int y, int z, @Nullable @Nullable ArtisanBlockData artisanBlockData)
      Sets custom block data at the specified location (the actual block in the world needs to be set manually first)
      参数:
      world - target world (non-null)
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      z - Z coordinate
      artisanBlockData - custom block data (null means air)

    • setArtisanBlockData

      default void setArtisanBlockData(@NotNull @NotNull Block block, @Nullable @Nullable ArtisanBlockData artisanBlockData)
      Sets custom block data at the specified location (the actual block in the world needs to be set manually first)
      参数:
      block - target location
      artisanBlockData - custom block data (null means air)

    • setArtisanBlockData

      default void setArtisanBlockData(@NotNull @NotNull Location location, @Nullable @Nullable ArtisanBlockData artisanBlockData)
      Sets custom block data at the specified location (the actual block in the world needs to be set manually first)
      参数:
      location - target location
      artisanBlockData - custom block data (null means air)
